TEXT.TITLE: AIR WIS SERVICES INC <ARWS> 4TH QTR NET
TEXT.BODY: Shr 32 cts vs five cts Net 2,362,000 vs 384,000 Revs 29.5 mln vs 31.2 mln Year Shr 66 cts vs 18 cts Net 4,869,000 vs 1,336,000 Revs 119.2 mln vs 120.2 mln NOTE: Net includes tax credits of 963,000 dlrs vs 720,000 dlrs in quarter and 613,000 dlrs vs 1,460,000 dlrs in year. Year net includes gains on sale of assets of 35 cts shr vs 14 cts shr. Reuter
